ocrd-tables.description: Fuse column regions and text lines into table cell TextRegions using DBSCAN (no ReadingOrder).

col_pad_frac.description: Horizontal padding added to each column band as a fraction of table width.

split_min_len_px.description: Discard fragments shorter than this after splitting at column borders.

dbscan_eps.description: DBSCAN eps in units of estimated line spacing.

row_halfspan.description: Half a row's vertical band in units of spacing (0.5 -> Â±0.5*S).

header_top_frac.description: Top fraction of table considered header (enables colSpan, no split).

keep_noise_rows.description: Keep DBSCAN noise as singleton rows (otherwise attach to nearest row).
